name: Unbreakable Vr Runner
description: Fun and a great cardio workout game for HTC Vive. This is a coin catcher game in which the player collects coins or candies and dodges obstacles at the same time. If the players headset hits an obstacle player lose. 4 totally different levels with same game style. The game works wonderfully in vr enviroment. Needs 1.5x2m space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
